titles: Of the auctorite of the word of god agaynst the bisshop of london wherein are conteyned certen disputacyons had in the parlament howse betwene the bisshops a bowt the nomber of the sacramen[n]ts and other things, very necessary to be known, made by Alexa[n]der Alane Scot and sent to the duke of Saxon.
author: Alesius, Alexander, 1500-1565.
Allen, Edmond, 1519?-1559.
notes: Running title reads: Of the auctorite of the word of god.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Sacraments --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
